column5: The MSc International Business aims to provide you with the knowledge and systematic understanding of theoretical and practical aspects of International Business. Graduates will gain a sound theoretical grounding in the area of International Business and develop a range of analytical and personal skills.INTRODUCTIONIf you want to pursue a career in international management—but want to develop a more in-depth understanding of global business issues, or even study a business subject for the first time—MSc International Business is for you.
column7: UK fees (applies to Channel Islands, Isle of Man and Republic of Ireland) Full-time place, per year - £13,500 Part-time place, per year - £6,750  International fees Full-time place, per year - £26,000 Part-time place, per year - £13,000
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
